sql.if: title like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%') or content like concat('%', #{page.keyword}, '%')

mapper.insert: insert into ${boardTitle}(title, writer, reg_date, views, content, comment_count, notice) values(#{board.title}, #{board.writer}, now(), 0, #{board.content}, 0, #{board.notice})
mapper.select: select count(*) from ${boardTitle} where and notice=0
mapper.insert: insert into ${boardTitle}_comment(post_num, id, reg_date, content) values(#{comment.postNum}, #{comment.id}, now(), #{comment.content})
mapper.select: select * from (select a.post_num, a.comment_num, a.id, a.reg_date, a.content, b.nickname from ${boardTitle}_comment a inner join member b on a.id=b.id where a.post_num=#{page.postNum} order by a.comment_num desc limit #{page.postBeginPoint}, #{page.displayPostLimit} ) c order by comment_num
select count(*) from ${boardTitle}_views where post_num=#{postNum} and ip=#{ip}
select count(*) from ${boardTitle}_recommend where post_num=#{recommendDTO.postNum} and user_id=#{recommendDTO.userId}
mapper.delete: delete from ${boardTitle}_recommend where post_num=#{recommendDTO.postNum} and user_id=#{recommendDTO.userId}
mapper.select: SELECT korean_title FROM board_list WHERE board_title = #{boardTitle}
